title: 10 Countries in Asia Pacific with the largest number of Christians in 2010
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Estimated Christian population in millions in the y axis.
Country Philippines has the highest Estimated Christian population in millions and Burma (Myanmar) has the lowest Estimated Christian population in millions.
The difference of Estimated Christian population in millions between the highest and lowest Country is 83.0.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Estimated Christian population in millions in each Country on the y axis.
The Estimated Christian population in millions is appeared to be the highest at Country Philippines and lowest at Country Burma (Myanmar).
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Estimated Christian population in millions in the y axis.
Country Philippines has the highest Estimated Christian population in millions and Burma (Myanmar) has the lowest Estimated Christian population in millions.
The difference of Estimated Christian population in millions between the highest and lowest Country is 83.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Estimated Christian population in millions for 10 number of Countrys.
Country Philippines has the highest Estimated Christian population in millions and Burma (Myanmar) has the lowest Estimated Christian population in millions.
Second maximum Estimated Christian population in millions is found at Country China.
The difference of Estimated Christian population in millions between the highest and lowest Country is 83.0.
The Country Philippines has the highest Estimated Christian population in millions, followed by China, and India. Down to the Country Burma (Myanmar) which is the lowest.
Considered together, the average Estimated Christian population in millions in all 10 Countrys is roughly 25.88.
The Estimated Christian population in millions is 258.81 if we add up values of all Countrys.
